channel.title: Server Disconnections and nulls
channel.description: hello, my server discconnects everyone that logs in, how do i fix this? i am using richscape, it says "Connection from: IPADRESSHERE Client Handler: Client NAME Disconnected <IPADRESSHERE>" How Do I fix this? please help. Also my sever has a bunch of null connections, how do i get rid of these.? Thank you if u can fix it. the null says "Connection from: ex ip adress Client Handler: Client Null Disconnected <ex ip adress>"

item.title: Server Disconnections and nulls
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

you mean, make my own source? do you know a good tut for that? ive been wanting to, i just need a good tut.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Disconnections and nulls
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“thunderflea, post:3, topic:339469”]what do you mean? do you have a source that you would recommend?
also, why would the source be leech proof if they released it.[/quote]

Dude, it’s for “copyrighted” issues. Please noticed I hypothetically quoted that. Anyways, they did it so people like a leecher cant claim work of someone else’s.

Start from pure shit, move your way up.

Read full topic

Client Handler: Client NAME Disconnected "
How Do I fix this? please help.
